TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DSAKeyValue extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause

summary.span: 表示 元素的 私钥。

span.span: Represents the private key of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示``元素，它包含公钥。The class represents the `` element, which contains a public key. 使用来标识对应的公钥用于创建数字签名的私钥。Use to identify the public key that corresponds to the private key that was used to create the digital signature. 如果密钥未显式提供给构造函数，一个新随机生成密钥对。If a key is not explicitly supplied to the constructor, a new key pair is randomly generated. 类与 XML 签名一起使用。The class is used with XML signatures. 有关 W3C 规范的详细信息，请参阅http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/。For more information about the W3C specification, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用XML 加密，以创建分离的签名中的类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in XML encryption to create a detached signature. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/CPP/exampledetached.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/CS/exampledetached.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/VB/exampledetached.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用XML 加密，以创建一个封装签名中的类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in XML encryption to create an envelope signature. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/CPP/exampleenvelope.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/CS/exampleenvelope.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/VB/exampleenvelope.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 用新的、随机生成的 公钥初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a new, randomly-generated public key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建新密钥，此构造函数使用的默认实现由定义类。When creating a new key, this constructor uses the default implementation of as defined by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示用于对 XML 进行签名的 DSA 密钥。This property represents the DSA key used to sign the XML.
